trans-unit.source: The WS-Addressing version associated with a SOAP message or understood by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 與 SOAP 訊息相關聯或是由端點所了解的 WS-Addressing 版本。

trans-unit.source: There are currently two version of WS-Addressing: WS-Addressing August 2004 and WS-Addressing 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 目前有兩個 WS-Addressing 版本可用：2004 年 8 月的 WS-Addressing 版本和 WS-Addressing 1.0。

trans-unit.source: These versions can be retrieved using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.WSAddressingAugust2004%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.WSAddressing10%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個版本分別可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.WSAddressingAugust2004%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.WSAddressing10%2A> 屬性來加以擷取。

trans-unit.source: There is also an addressing version available that is not associated with WS-Addressing, which is retrieved using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.None%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 也有一個可用的定址版本與 WS-Addressing 不相關，它可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.None%2A> 屬性來加以擷取。

trans-unit.source: This value indicates that no version of WS-Addressing is used.
trans-unit.target: 這個值表示不會使用 WS-Addressing 的任何版本。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily for transports that do not pass SOAP envelopes on the wire and therefore have no use for WS-Addressing.
trans-unit.target: 這主要適用於在網路上未傳遞 SOAP 封套的傳輸，因此對 WS-Addressing 沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The addressing version is part of the message version: specifically <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 定址版本為訊息版本的一部分：特別是，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> 會提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> 屬性的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> also contains the SOAP envelope version in addition to the addressing version information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 除了定址版本資訊外，也包含 SOAP 封套版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> 會提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> 屬性的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the addressing version that is not associated with WS-Addressing version.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 WS-Addressing 版本不相關聯的定址版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> that is not associated WS-Addressing version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" />，不是關聯的 WS-Addressing 版本。

trans-unit.source: The addressing version is part of the message version: specifically <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 定址版本為訊息版本的一部分：特別是，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> 會提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> 屬性的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> also contains the SOAP envelope version in addition to the addressing version information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 除了定址版本資訊外，也包含 SOAP 封套版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> 會提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> 屬性的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current addressing version.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前定址版本的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current addressing version.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前定址版本的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for the address version associated with WS-Addressing 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 WS-Addressing 1.0 相關聯之位址版本的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A singleton instance that identifies the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> that is associated with WS-Addressing 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 單一執行個體，可識別與 WS-Addressing 1.0 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: The addressing version is part of the message version: specifically <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 定址版本為訊息版本的一部分：特別是，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> 會提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> 屬性的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> also contains the SOAP envelope version in addition to the addressing version information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 除了定址版本資訊外，也包含 SOAP 封套版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> 會提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> 屬性的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of WS-Addressing that is associated with WS-Addressing August 2004.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 2004 年 8 月 WS-Addressing 版本相關聯的 WS-Addressing 版本。

trans-unit.source: A singleton instance that identifies the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> that is associated with WS-Addressing August 2004.
trans-unit.target: 單一執行個體，可識別與 2004 年 8 月 WS-Addressing 版本相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: The addressing version is part of the message version: specifically <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 定址版本為訊息版本的一部分：特別是，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> 會提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> 屬性的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> also contains the SOAP envelope version in addition to the addressing version information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 除了定址版本資訊外，也包含 SOAP 封套版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> 會提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> 屬性的傳回型別。
